transcript.text: the point of of of U public relations

much as whether you support the people
in Iowa of course there was an issue the

you don't want people to think about the
issue that's the whole point of good
propaganda you want to create a slogan
that nobody's going to be against and I
suppose everybody will before because
nobody knows what it means because
doesn't mean anything but its crucial
value is it diverts your attention from
a question that does mean something do

that's absolutely crucial you never have
